Reviews.Title: terrible product
Reviews.Author: Trisha T
Reviews.Content: doesnt work,, the camera heats up so fast and has no picture.  its not worth the money, dont buy this item,, waste of time

Reviews.Title: UPDATE: Gets Hot! dropped from 3 stars to 1!
Reviews.Author: Vance
Reviews.Content: I originally wanted these for a custom nanny cam idea so I ordered 2. I took a chance on the price vs reviews and compared to the other types in the price range, this seemed to fair much better (esp vs the clock cam item!). So I hooked it up first on a HD flat screen with auto motion/screen adjust to test it and it was not good. However, when you hook it up to a CRT tube TV or computer monitor, it is fine! There is color, you can adjust the focus and the camera is comparable to a slightly larger cube of sugar. The best part is it comes with the constant power supply - plug in normal voltage AND a 9volt cord for true wireless placement. There is audio but the mics appear to be on the sides and it can be low so I wouldn't count on picking up low conversations unless closely mounted. I tested the range which I have a 2 floor 2300 sq ft colonial and I left the receiver in the south most guest room and took the wireless cam down to the north most living room..it was ok but had static and buzzing. Best compromise is if you want it on different floors, then setup in the room above/below the receiver and it works better. You can hook this up screen direct viewing or into a DVR/laptop/VCR as long as it has RCA inputs.Pros:- Dual power for wireless cam- Sugar cube sized- adjustable focus- color pic- has audio but limited performance- lightweight cam and receiver- PriceCons:- mediocre audio performance if any- very narrow range to fine tune- range subjective to your environment/house- does warm up some in use (not sure if I'm very concerned at that at this point)- Cannot be used on HD flat screens with auto adjusting screens without it being confused, it will flicker when camera signal spazzes- Wire points could use some reinforcing (I would silicone the base of the wires entering the cam to support/stiffen it)so it  decreases the chance of getting pulled outUPDATE: 10/10/2013 - Above is my original post - this is an update after a month or so of straight usage -I was repositioning my cameras because I wanted better angles and I hooked a separate DVR to the interior cams vs the exterior security cams. Holy Jesus I guess after some use these things really heat up! It was a good thing I didn't stuff them in plush animals or by curtains. The power connection point and the mini cam itself was actually pretty hot! Out of curiosity, I used my automotive infrared heat scanner. After about 20 min or so, the ac power connection point averaged about 116 degrees F and the camera itself was at 96 degrees F! I am not sure what to say about that, I'm shocked and I certainly am weary about leaving them unattended now. Perhaps I should count my blessings that i've used them for a month and my house didn't burn down? I can't say that I noted my wired cams getting this hot so I will check them when I can gain access to them but I unhooked these 2 cams for now. Thank god it was wireless so at least I didn't have to start yanking wires...still shockedFor what it's worth: Fact - it is still functioning despite the temperature, still has better picture than my swann wired cams, I will not install it by curtains or inside plush animals, I will not leave this on while away from home, the price of other wireless spy cams even in "professional" grade has about a 3 star rating give or take but they can run up to the hundreds. At 20 bucks a unit and it is still functioning, I will just find another part time usage since I can't return it. Maybe I will use it outdoor when the dog and kid are in the yard playing or something..2/9/2014: Question: has anyone tried a 5V power supply? I have seen similar online but a couple have a 5V power supply and I was wondering if that makes a difference. I had a 3V but it wasn't strong enough to give a proper signal, it was on but the signal power was useless to the point where I didn't get a steady pic in the same room. It seems it needs a decent amount of power for a good signal to send but I'm hoping perhaps if I find a good balance I may use this without it burning. I really need anoth cam in another part of the house where the nanny goes but trying to run wires to it is very complex. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Poor sound and video
Reviews.Author: Win Oo
Reviews.Content: Very poor sound recording.  too much background noises.  Video is hard to tunning and picture is not clear even in close range.

Reviews.Title: Item DOA.
Reviews.Author: A. Johnston "Zenophobe"
Reviews.Content: As was stated in a previous review. Camera was very hot with 9V plug.Antenna was very difficult to screw on.Connected via video output to TV nothing.Turned the tuning dial nothing.Tried the camera with a 9V battery nothing.Basically you get what you paid for.Returned for refund!

Reviews.Title: Would not reccomend even though it is a good idea for a camera.
Reviews.Author: Roy Spanton
Reviews.Content: It worked well for a week and stopped working after that. Good idea but not very durable.  I would not suggest purchasing product.

Reviews.Title: Work pretty good
Reviews.Author: Mike Bullough
Reviews.Content: For $23 this little camera works very well. Becareful not to lose the litlte spring that goes inside of the antenna.

Reviews.Title: JUNK!
Reviews.Author: James J. Farrell
Reviews.Content: THIS IS JUNK !!!!  don't even think of buying this thing ! lousy audio and video ! looks great but doesn't work .

Reviews.Title: Catching the bad people
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: some trouble tuning, but seems to work well overall. Think it will come in handy as to who keeps visiting our meds while we are not home.

Reviews.Title: Great for short range
Reviews.Author: MatthewDMerrill
Reviews.Content: I recently got this despite the other reviews and it turned out pretty good. The only thing is the camera and the receiver get hot. The chargers must go with one or the other. The receiver takes the 12 volt charger and the camera gets the 9 volt charger. Tunning is a little tricky and takes about a minute of turning slowly.

Reviews.Title: This Product sucks
Reviews.Author: Tim Witkoski
Reviews.Content: if i could give this a 0 i would.. the receiver  and the camera do not work and i can't get a picture i want a refund or a new one i absolutely hate that it I'm pissed

Reviews.Title: It works.
Reviews.Author: Jason Wilkinson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to begin work on a security system.  (Actually as monitoring system for my soon to be surveillance camera server.) I found the product to be of generally high quality.  The broadcast range is not large, perhaps 50-75' and tuning the receiver can be a bit tricky, but for the price, the system is a decent value.

Reviews.Title: Dont Buy.....JUNK!
Reviews.Author: DENNIS GROMAN
Reviews.Content: I cannot stress enough but DO NOT BUY THIS!! Cam quit working after only the second day of use. Total junk!

Reviews.Title: Power supplies failed, but video works pretty good
Reviews.Author: Randj
Reviews.Content: It tested good right out of the box, and I installed it in a halloween prop for use. Then when testing again, the receiver power supply failed. It took a while to figure that problem out. Basically, I had intermittent power at the receiver indicated by the red power LED. I finally looked at the LED on the power supply and realized that was the problem. (So I'm slow, you benefit my honesty.) Once I used another spare power supply that I had, I still could not get a picture on the TV. In checking out the camera end of the problem, I checked the power supply and found that not working. Once that was replaced, the picture came right in and worked great. I'm not returning it for these problems because I intend to power it from other sources anyway once the halloween props are installed, so no big issue for me. It's still a pretty good system for the cost.Updated 2Oct13:Okay, so October is here and my Halloween props are up. The camera worked pretty well for about 20 minutes, and then the picture started "rolling" horizontally. Those of us familiar with older TV's remember trying to adjust the hold knob on the back to stop the vertical rolling. It was annoying then and it's annoying now. The problem is that there isn't a knob on the back of this to adjust. I'm going to try opening the case on the receiver to see if there is an adjustment screw. The picture isn't bad if you don't mind seeing it steadily pass by.The sound is poor.

Reviews.Title: Sort of works
Reviews.Author: Ryan Newton
Reviews.Content: In the product description it reads that the images can be transferred over 500 ft or something like that, but it only works from 5-10 feet away. The image in that range is very fuzzy and calibrating it is hard and doesn't help. I would recommend paying a little bit more and getting a better camera.

Reviews.Title: Barely Works
Reviews.Author: aptpath
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for. This product works, but barely. Constantly looses signal and can't get audio to work.

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: Edward Estepa
Reviews.Content: The video is grainy so the Video needs improving. Maybe a signal boost could help? Or mor power would help

Reviews.Title: Didnt work...just static.....and something sounds like its broken inside receiver ........crap....Dont Buy
Reviews.Author: tommy
Reviews.Content: Didnt work...just static.....and something sounds like its broken inside receiver ........crap....Dont Buy this product....Now im stuck with 30.00 worth of trash

Reviews.Title: gets hot and quits working
Reviews.Author: BB
Reviews.Content: first of all it was inexpensive, so i guess ya git what ya pay for. i'm not mad at the camera. it does work for short periods and is hard to tune sometime. but it was cheaper than most others. good luck with yours if you go whit this one.

Reviews.Title: bad product
Reviews.Author: Ashraf Salam
Reviews.Content: products is not work , and very cheap quality , i just throw it a way after trying with it for 2 hours , bad product

Reviews.Title: Not even worth returning
Reviews.Author: AlaskaBrazTex
Reviews.Content: As they say - you get what you pay for.  Hook up is a no brainer, so that that wasn't the problem.  I don't know if it wasn't receiving or wasn't transmitting.  When you turned the tuner dial and held it close a few lines would sporadically show up on the screen - just enough to say it was doing something - but it was completely useless.

Reviews.Title: mini camera
Reviews.Author: A. Cartwright "Amy Lynn Cartwright"
Reviews.Content: I thought this would be a great product and I'm sure it would be if I could figure it out.  The instructions aren't very good.  If you don't have a TV, this wont' work.  Its been months later and I still can't figure it out.  I'm going to have to resale it to someone who is more technically oriented.  Too many wires and not enough instructions.

Reviews.Title: DOA
Reviews.Author: A. B. Green
Reviews.Content: Didn't work, at one point I was holding the camera and i got video for a half sec. Unit looks to be well made but that really doesn't matter if it doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: James Peulecke
Reviews.Content: I really liked the concept and the material arrived in excellent condition.  The Pinhole Camera suffers from overheating easily and then the quality of the picture deteriorates and becomes unrecognizable.

Reviews.Title: just a wireless toy
Reviews.Author: Robert M
Reviews.Content: Just a toy not good enough to be actually used unless your in the same room very hard to keep picture from being fuzzy.

Reviews.Title: Did not work well for me
Reviews.Author: Coach Tom
Reviews.Content: Poor quality signs. Price was not best but it was prime. It came quickly and did not work for my setup.  I would not buy again.

Reviews.Title: if one and only one is on it works well, if another is on it will interfere with other.
Reviews.Author: casey robinson
Reviews.Content: hard time having two wireless modems in same room they interfere with each other.if one and only one is on it works well, if another is on it will interfere with other.

Reviews.Title: Not worth it
Reviews.Author: Shawn B. Hill
Reviews.Content: Save your money and time. The product ships fast however it is cheap, unusable, and simply creates a hastle. You, like me and the others will return it.

Reviews.Title: What do you want for 20 bucks
Reviews.Author: NetDave
Reviews.Content: Really can't say much about this camera. Cheap price, cheap quality. Really don't need to say much more, RIGHT! It does produce a picture, but the wireless signal affects the quality of picture - which is at 320 lines and grainy. Still, at 20 bucks it does work and it could be useful, maybe.

Reviews.Title: I dont like it
Reviews.Author: César A. Quintanilla
Reviews.Content: I dont liked, because mal function. Lost the signal and I dont see nothing.  I need buy another, but in good conditions.  Thanks what ever.

Reviews.Title: Piece of crap
Reviews.Author: Damion Cooper
Reviews.Content: As soon as I plugged in the 12v transmitter power supply, it burned up. Then I used the camera with the 9v battery adapter and the camera got darker and darker. Thinking the battery might be low, I plugged in the camera power adapter to the camera, and the camera stopped working completely! I guess you get what you pay for and next time I'm spending more on someone else's product. Not even worth the effort of returning it.

Reviews.Title: TERRIBLE!
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: The reception, even when right next to the receiver, is absolutely horrible! The microphone is useless! All you hear is static humming. This was a complete waste of money! Not happy at all!

Reviews.Title: Terrible Range.
Reviews.Author: cb950 "cb950"
Reviews.Content: This thing has terrible range.  It wouldn't work for me further than about 10 feet line of sight.  bad picture even at that. I suspected that the other bad reviews were operator error, but I was wrong.  I shook the cable around on the camera figuring something must not be right, and the thing must've broke internally as it stopped working completely. There was no option to change the channel either, just the dial on the receiver to tune into the camera.  I'm sad to say that this seems to be another terrible quality product from china that's too good to be true.

Reviews.Title: Didn`t worked on my PS3 TV!
Reviews.Author: ronald "Ohhhhhhhhhh"
Reviews.Content: I connected everything together to my PS3 TV. No signal to the tv. I connected the camera to another old TV and it work. It was very grainy but usable for what I needed. But anyway it doesn`t work on any tv for some reason that I can`t figure it out. Not using it at the moment.

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: Jim Schuler
Reviews.Content: got it. spent the time to hook it up. well it didnt work. not to mention it was missing the battery cable.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste  your time
Reviews.Author: T. Hall
Reviews.Content: I have never had a problem with purchasing products on Amazon.  This is my first (and hopefully last) bad experience.  This does not work as advertised.  The instructions a cryptic.  The wifi range is a joke.  And the audio is like a thousand nails going down a blackboard.  Worst of all it is not worth the trouble returning.Learn from my mistake and don't buy this mini cam.

Reviews.Title: piece of crap
Reviews.Author: Suzi
Reviews.Content: I could not get it to work.It almost worked with the plug in but nothing with the battery attachment.I would not recomend!

Reviews.Title: some DEAL
Reviews.Author: lonnie ray bell
Reviews.Content: AS LOOKS GO ITS NICE  AS FOR THE  WORKING OF IT  THE RANGE SUCKS YOU CANT PUT IT 10 FOOT AWAY  AND NOT THRU A WALL  LOOKS LIKE A GREAT DEAL

Reviews.Title: Very poor range.
Reviews.Author: Mike A
Reviews.Content: This device is a good concept however the transmitter is way to weak to be useful.  The picture was weak at 3 ft and faided out entirely at 10 ft with no obstructions.  You are better off with a dedicated video transmitter.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: robinfla
Reviews.Content: Didn't really expect much, so found it to be up to expectations. Reception fuzzy and not very far and picture was not very clear but somewhat adequate. Also, couldn't see settings as screen kept rolling as in old tv sets (horizontal hold). I might have kept it were it not for the dvr and settings problem. But I really want something with a little better video quality.

Reviews.Title: Not good at all. Get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: dennis
Reviews.Content: Doesnt work half the time and will not work correctly with the 9V battery unless your 4 feet away. Not a good product.

Reviews.Title: What range?  What sound?  There is neither...
Reviews.Author: D. Myers
Reviews.Content: Don't waste your time.  The range is less than 20 feet (with no obstacles between the camera and receiver) and it is constantly flickering even then.  It's supposed to have sound?  I've never heard a thing from it.  I guess for $30 or so dollars I shouldn't be surprised.

Reviews.Title: Quit working after 1st time
Reviews.Author: David Kottke
Reviews.Content: I used it once with my grandson for a science fair project and it quit working. We have to finish the project so I don't want to do it but I will reorder and try again.

Reviews.Title: bad product
Reviews.Author: ahmed
Reviews.Content: the product is extremely bad, the camera heated very quickly,i don't advise any person to buy this product, it have a very low qulity.

Reviews.Title: didn't work at all
Reviews.Author: lane29
Reviews.Content: Opened receiver up and there was several loose wires and nothing workeddon't get it spend the extra cash please

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: Exceeded my expectations. Camera is pointed out the front window and I'm in the back bedroom 50-60 feet away and through 2 walls, still get a good picture. When within 30-40 feet or less, picture is great..

Reviews.Title: Gets hot quickly
Reviews.Author: R. Loe
Reviews.Content: Once it heats up, the excellent image that it has when cool needs retuned on the receiver and has very poor quality.

Reviews.Title: home protection
Reviews.Author: kennethmitchell
Reviews.Content: This is a good item to put in your house for when your needing to keep an eye on people you dont trust, and lets face it...we all know someone like that...its small, and gets the job done will be ordering more cameras

Reviews.Title: picture quality not good
Reviews.Author: Raul
Reviews.Content: Not a good camera bad reciption when put down stairs hard to adjust picture  just spend a little more money  to get a better camera

Reviews.Title: tough to tune
Reviews.Author: RudyBaaws1362
Reviews.Content: I really like the camera but it is kinda tough to tune it so you get and keep a clear picture

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: Paul Homer
Reviews.Content: I love it. Hooked it up to my computer, adjusted the receiver and started recording. I would recommend it to anyone needing covert home security

Reviews.Title: not bad!!
Reviews.Author: rickey r ritchie
Reviews.Content: works pretty good til you get like 30 feet then its blank but then i pic up the reciever and it comes in not bad for price think im gonna get another 1

Reviews.Title: wrong item and broken out of the box.
Reviews.Author: WTF
Reviews.Content: i ordered this camera. got all excited when it came. drove across the valley to pick it up from my post box, drove back home, un boxed it and the first thing i noticed was that its not even the same setup that i ordered. i ordered the 2.4g and they sent me a 900mhz. then i hooked it up anyway figuring that ill just deal with it and the cheap POS doesnt even work. what is this, an episode of PUNK'D? i dont see ashton... im pissed!

Reviews.Title: it is no good
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This thing is so bad, it gets no reception and is so hard too use or tune into the frequency.. Would not recommend it to anyone

Reviews.Title: Informed Purchaser
Reviews.Author: gary
Reviews.Content: I like the item but had some initial problems with it functioning correctly. I would and have recommended this item to other but I also inform them of all of the pros and cons. I believe and informed decision help for a better response and increases the thought process to make a purchase.

Reviews.Title: works well.as expected thanks
Reviews.Author: Dennis M Herman
Reviews.Content: Works ok., touchy tuner, poor audio mic.and pictures is a bit grainy.  Thanks again for the new one of this is a

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: W. T. peace "perrinnn"
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera and receiver for the price. It sends a clear signal and is stealthy. On the other hand it won't work if it is within ten feet of my router. No worries I set it up in the other room.

Reviews.Title: Not for moving around
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: I wanted to be able to walk around with it but was not able to get a good picture.  If the camera was near the receiver and was not moving it did ok.  Picture was actually better then what I thought it would be.

Reviews.Title: It'll get the job done
Reviews.Author: Rusty Starnes
Reviews.Content: I was planning on using this camera for a sort of nanny cam, but I found out it really doesn't last long with the 9v battery option which was what I was hoping to do with it. Its still an ok camera for the money.

Reviews.Title: Good Purchase
Reviews.Author: Gunslinger
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews, I was hesitant to order this product, but the one I received works just fine.  IT is perfect for the use I intend to use it for and I have no regrets with ordering this product especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: pinhole cam
Reviews.Author: George McDonald
Reviews.Content: works good but gets very hot when it is runmust be some way to cool it down, Is there anyway to cool it off while running?

Reviews.Title: worth the cost I paid
Reviews.Author: Greg Brady
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is none existent.  Signal strength is almost embarrassing.  Product quality is definitely reflective of the cost.  That being said,  its a cheap toy and I knew that when I bought it.  Worth the 20 I spent.

Reviews.Title: cool for the price
Reviews.Author: ryan white
Reviews.Content: cool for the price might make a decent security camera for your house but def does not go 1/10 of a mile more like 25 feet but like i said cool for the price.

Reviews.Title: Works but needs improvement in signal reception
Reviews.Author: mausolfb "Technology Enthusiast"

} cv_mo1K71KT6GQSBZ7preplay.onmouseout = function() { cv_mo1K71KT6GQSBZ7preplay.src = "http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/91hEjmbO-pS._SX320_PHcustomer-video-vignette_PIvideo-reviews-bottom,BottomLeft,0,43_OU01_PIcustomer-video-play,BottomLeft,130,-12_CR0,0,0,0_.png"; } var node = cv_mo1K71KT6GQSBZ7preplay.parentNode; var cv_mo1K71KT6GQSBZ7currentClick = node.onclick; node.onclick = function () { var head = document.getElementsByTagName("head"); if (head[0]) { var logTag = document.createElement('script'); logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo1K71KT6GQSBZ7currentClick) { return cv_mo1K71KT6GQSBZ7currentClick(); } } } Length:: 4:07 MinsThis little 2.4GHz camera from HDE works well provided if being used indoors you don't put the camera and receiver too far away from each other. The camera will transmit video and audio to the receiver that you can view on anything that uses RCA inputs.In the box is the 2.4GHz camera, two AC adapters (one 9 volt and another a 12 volt), a 9 volt battery adapter, 2.4GHz receiver and RCA male-to-male cables.The camera itself operates on a fixed 2.4GHz frequency. The receiver uses a tuning knob to adjust the receiver's frequency to match up with what frequency the camera is transmitting on. In terms of supplying power I've found the 12 volt adapter is best for the receiver and the 9 volt works for the camera. Either one however will operate between 9 and 12 volts.Now the camera does get warm in two places. The first is the camera's input power connector. I've noticed it is a little larger than a standard female DC connector. My guess is for there to be heat generated there that it has a built-in power resistor to help limit current/voltage to the camera to prevent it from damage. The other area is the camera itself. Most likely this is from the 2.4GHz transmitter and camera electronics inside the camera housing. I've handled other small cameras like this and they do get noticeably warm.Which now brings up the issue in the title: signal reception. All video transmitters are measured by their power output (in milliwatts (mW)). For a camera this small, it's obvious the power output is small (I'm guessing less than 10mW). Now 2.4GHz has a short wavelength when compared to something like 900MHz which is longer. So, if you had a transmitter on 900MHz and another on 2.4GHz with both having 10mW of power, the 900MHz one would have a signal that travels much farther (more range) but is more prone to interference hence why it uses 2.4GHz (FCC regulations also play a part in what can operate on what frequency).The other problem is the receiver. It uses a standard TV coaxial connection for its antenna. I would've liked to have seen a more standardized antenna connector for using high dbi gain antennas to improve reception. The antenna provided is pretty generic form receiving a signal. However, all this is what makes the product affordable.

Reviews.Title: Introductory item
Reviews.Author: Damon
Reviews.Content: This item was used on a scaled RC tank to provide wireless vision.  It works well up to about 40 feet away, depending on how high the receiver is off of the ground.  Remember to order an EasyCAP or similar device to view the video on your computer.  The only minus is the low range, although what can you expect from such an inexpensive combo?  It was a great introduction into the world of wireless video, and helped me greatly in understanding how systems like it could be used for DIY projects.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: jefferyleobehen
Reviews.Content: It is go I use it a lot for my house i can see come up the driveway it about 200yards away form the and got good picture with it .I have no problem with it all it .

Reviews.Title: Be careful setting it up or you can damage the unit
Reviews.Author: OphirDude
Reviews.Content: I have read where several people indicated that the device gets very hot.  There are two physically identical AC Adapters, including the power plugs (this is a very poor design):  #1: Output = 12V @ 1.0A.  This is for the Receiver  #2: Output = 9V @ 1.0A.  This is for the cameraIt is possible to incorrectly connect the AC Adapters (if you did not know they were different, then you have a 50/50 chance of an incorrect configuration).My setup is near line-of-sight at approximately 40' and the resulting picture quality is very decent.  As with any wireless camera, the image quality is decent but there is a tiny bit of "snow" due to the fact that it is an analog transmission.  The image quality issue prevents using the camera for motion detection unless you are able to perform post processing on the image.  For the low price (< $25), the image is quite good.However, because it is an analog device, I am not sure if it is possible to have multiple active cameras as their frequencies may overlap and interfere with each other.  Also, I did not connect the audio channel; consequently, I am unable to provide any feedback on the audio quality.

Reviews.Title: to sintonize the video
Reviews.Author: Estuardo Hernandez Argueta
Reviews.Content: I already connect the camera, I use the botton to sintonize the video, but i felt that the base and camera are not working together because anydevice also can connect to...The camera is okay, for home uses is okay, buy not in IP environment.Thank you

Reviews.Title: Final: 3 stars for its Price as being cheaper than the other.
Reviews.Author: Loc Nguyen
Reviews.Content: Audio: Sound is hard to listen. It was only Two Stars.Video: Daytime was 3.5 stars. Night time: 0 or 1 star.Final: 3 stars.

Reviews.Title: Great all-in-one system package
Reviews.Author: Mark Blans
Reviews.Content: The system works great. The camera (cube) and it's power connector do get hot, due to the transmitter. I have my cam placed in a building some 250' away from the receiver in another building.  Best, to let both get up to temp before doing your final tuning, which might involve mucking around with the receivers antenna to get a super-crisp colour image (note: that a power outage requires retuning). The sound is quite lacking but is there albeit muffled. It has a very decent transmission distance (I received other cam signals, when initially tuning my camera in)! Works very well, in low light situations.  I like the package so much, I ordered four more (as they came down in price even more!). I would recommend this product to others whom have a need for a camera the size of a pool cue chalk, that's easy to hide (or at least not be easy to find). Great buy.

Reviews.Title: pinhole camera
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: this works fine working with the only problem i have is that it doesn't have audio sound but still would work

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Ryan D
Reviews.Content: Totally awesome, a wireless camera for $20 bucks. You can even hook up a 9 volt battery to it and walk around with it. For the money completely worth it! I had the thing up and running showing a live stream on my TV in about 5 minutes.

Reviews.Title: works good for the price
Reviews.Author: lynn
Reviews.Content: for the price it works good, bought this and another brand and this surpassed the other in quality, can get fuzzy at times but for  the price cant complain

Reviews.Title: not too bad but not quite what I was expecting
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Rodland
Reviews.Content: Gets an extra star because the shipping was faster than estimated. Camera does work well. Had it tuned in and set up within minutes of unboxing. Camera was black and white though, I was expecting color. It is really small though which is nice. Works pretty decent in a semi dark room. So far no major heat issues.

Reviews.Title: It work just like it says
Reviews.Author: Spencer Daines
Reviews.Content: Not the best camera but is cheap, and works just fine.a good buy if you just need a small camera and not hd quiality.

Reviews.Title: not bad
Reviews.Author: Charles W Shaffer
Reviews.Content: picture could be a little better but if range is far away lots of interfearance happens  put it on a RC Car  and record runs  not bad at all for the priceupdated cam gets better picture thanks

Reviews.Title: works as expected, max range is about 100ft
Reviews.Author: Sir Steamer Service
Reviews.Content: works for my purpose, i am only keeping an eye on my cars in front of the house, instead of going to window ever time i can just flip the TV on now and record if necessary.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: JM
Reviews.Content: The camera wasn't as small as I thought but it did work better than stated in most of the reviews I had read. The one major issue I have is one of the AC power cords stopped working. I had it plugged in powering the reciever for about 30 min and it let out a little puff of smoke and died.The product is ok for the price.

Reviews.Title: i like it
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: it works great but the camera seems to get really hot and i have to unplug it  so it cools down but it has sound and video seems fine

Reviews.Title: just as they said,
Reviews.Author: perry reeves
Reviews.Content: was just as i read in the reviews, only wish the reciver had a battery pack, too use when were camping to watch our dogs. got what i wanted, dose what i needed it to.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Rama Fazel
Reviews.Content: This product rocks! For only $20, i literally owned a complete pinhole camera system! You can't beat that! Excellent product.

Reviews.Title: fast delivery
Reviews.Author: Thomas Workmaster
Reviews.Content: This is a very good camera to see if anyone comes around your door thanks a lot i look to buy some more.

Reviews.Title: VERY poor picture.
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: The picture is ok if you have it plugged into the wall, but the battery dose not make it work good at all. this thing gets real hot after a few seconds of use. I'm afraid it will fry itself after 30 min or so. Very touchy receiver, you have to have a very steady hand to tune this thing in. there is a very very very small spot that the picture comes in when dialing this in.

Reviews.Content: Quality and resolution is horrible and theres nothing to hold the camera stillWtf fix this s*** asap now.....!!!ðŸ˜žðŸ˜"mad af

Reviews.Title: Hidden Pinhole Mini Camera
Reviews.Author: David Norton
Reviews.Content: When I ordered the product I was fully aware of its capabilities and the product lived up to my expectations. I found the price to be very reasonable. I received it in the normal amount of time. This is the reason I have given this 5 stars. There was nothing that I found that was unsatisfactory. I would recommend this product to anyone that understands the product. It does what it is supposed to do.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Chef Guido
Reviews.Content: haven't tried it out yet...need to by an adapter to connect to computer.  Dissapointed that I did not get a packing slip with the item.  Hopefully will not have to return it because of no packing slip

Reviews.Title: Not exactly what I was expecting.
Reviews.Author: Tracy
Reviews.Content: Perfect size. The picture is not as expected. I wanted it to hook up my PC but it not, does not. I had to plug it into the TV. Picture is not as clear as preferred but it does work.

Reviews.Title: Great product.

Reviews.Content: I use it indoors facing outside of the window to monitor the driveway. Works better during the day. No night vision but a very cheap well working camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
Pinhole security camera protects your home or business
The mini pinhole camera can transmit clear audio and color video up to 200' (60m) in an open space
TV system: NTSC/ELA | Scan frequency: NTSC/ELA 60Hz | Definition: 380TV Lines | Works on a wireless frequency of .9GHz to 1.2GHz
Package contents: 1x Wireless Camera, 1x Wireless Receiver, 1x A/V Cables, 1x Camera 9v Power adapter, 1x Receiver 12v Power Adapter, 1x Battery Clip, 1x User manual.
HDE is a registered trademark and is the only authorized seller of HDE branded products
ProductInfo.Name: HDE Pinhole Mini Wireless Camera CCTV Security Video Surveillance
